title: Artist Alley Registration Now Open!
content:
Artist Alley registration is live! The online form will be open from January 7th through January 23nd. Applications will be reviewed using a juried process. Please note that there are limited spots available for 2023.

JAFAX will be held from June 9th through the 11th, 2023 in downtown Grand Rapids at the Devos Place Convention Center!
